nodes.text: Kor Gorensla was a gas giant located in Hutt Space. It was the throneworld of the Gorensla kajidic.

Kor Gorensla was a ringed, deep green gas giant located in Hutt Space. It was orbited by six mid-sized moons and fifteen large asteroids. These satellites were all heavily terraformed, which provided a variety of environments for the Hutts of the Gorensla kajidic.

Kor Gorensla served as the throneworld of the Gorensla kajidic. At first, the Gorensla established their estates on Gorensla Hutta, the largest moon of Kor Gorensla. However, over time, important estates were also built on all of the other moons and asteroids that orbited the planet.

The Gorensla estates were filled with ancient, exotic wares from across the galaxy. These valuable items represented great investments for the Hutts of Gorensla, as they often stored them in the hopes of revealing them decades or centuries later to make a tidy profit.
